bing

Class BingSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • bing.BingSearch

  • public class BingSearch
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to functionality delivered by v5.0 of the Bing Web Search API. The official Microsoft documentation on the API is available at: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cognitive-services/bing-web-search/search-the-web
    Author:
    Miles Efron

    • Method Detail

      • runQueryToJson

        public java.lang.String runQueryToJson(java.lang.String queryString)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Runs a query and fetches the results as a JSON String
        Parameters:
        queryString - The keyword query we're going to run
        Returns:
        Search results encoded as a JSON object in the MS-defined format returned by the API endpoint
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Network or formatting problems.

      • runQueryToSearchHits

        public java.util.List<SearchHit> runQueryToSearchHits(java.lang.String queryString)
                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Runs a query and fetches the results as a List of SearchHit objects.
        Parameters:
        queryString - The keyword query we're going to run
        Returns:
        A Java List object of SearchHits containing the search results
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Network or formatting problems.
